nodes.text: Sabaa Tahir (born 1983) is the author of "Reirin," a short story that was published in the 2017 anthology From a Certain Point of View.

She grew up with her family in the Mojave Desert. She studied at the University of California, Los Angeles and later worked as an editor for the The Washington Post. She is the author of the An Ember in the Ashes novel series. Tahir lives with her family in the San Francisco Bay Area. She is of Pakistani-American heritage.
